title: Why can't Riot fix their mastery system?
body:
Clearly, Riot has no interest in making this game enjoyable for it's players. Fortunately the new system of essence/rewards/crafting will probably bankrupt them, as no one will have to pay for anything, but I digress.

In a surrender shortened game, on Blitz support, I scored 4/2/4, with 5,424 gold and a vision score of 24(9 was the second highest). I got an A.

The ADC, Tristana, scored 1/1/6 with 5,378  gold, and a vision score of 5. CS was 3rd best on the team and sixth best in the game, 75 in 16 minutes. She got an S. Not an S-, but an S. 

Seriously, whatever formula you are using Riot needs to be changed. I am so livid it's impossible to make a rational statement. The fact that you have no other way to complain than these idiotic boards is infuriating me more. I will spend zero dollars on this game in the future. I  already have all the champs and enough blue essence to buy every new champ for the next 10 years.
